Logging in Without a Password

by Sophie Engle on Aug 2013

You will likely be logging in to your CS account remotely often. You can setup your account to allow login without having to type in your password every time.

Linux/Mac Systems

You can use the same commands to setup password-less login using SSH keys on Linux or Mac systems. Open a terminal or shell window, and then see this article for detailed steps.

Windows Systems

You can use PuTTY for password-less SSH login in Windows. See this blog post for detailed steps.
